challenge.heading: The Challenge
challenge.intro: How do you visualize invisible technology? How do you communicate an audio experience through visual media? NTT needed to bring complex bone conduction and spatial audio technology to life for consumers and investors.

cards.title: Invisible Technology
cards.description: Bone conduction and spatial audio are inherently invisible. The design challenge was making users feel and understand something they can't see.

cards.title: Technical Complexity
cards.description: The engineering behind spatial audio is sophisticated. Communicating this without overwhelming non-technical audiences required careful visual translation.

cards.title: Consumer Market
cards.description: Moving from engineering concept to consumer product required understanding listener preferences and mental models around audio.

approach.heading: Our Approach
approach.intro: We combined deep user research into audio experiences with creative product visualization to bridge the gap between engineering and consumer understanding.

steps.title: Audio Research
steps.description: Deep research into audio experiences, listener preferences, and user mental models around spatial audio.

steps.title: Product Visualization
steps.description: Technical product rendering and illustration that makes complex audio technology tangible.

steps.title: Concept Communication
steps.description: Developing visual language that explains spatial audio concepts to non-technical audiences.

steps.title: Market Validation
steps.description: Music research and consumer testing to inform product positioning decisions.

work.heading: The Work
work.intro: Product visualization and user research that translated engineering innovation into consumer-ready concepts.

cards.title: Product Visualization
cards.description: Technical product rendering and illustration bringing invisible audio technology to life through compelling visual narratives.

cards.title: User Research
cards.description: Deep research into listener preferences and mental models around spatial audio, informing product development decisions.

cards.title: Concept Communication
cards.description: Marketing and presentation assets that make complex technology accessible and exciting to consumers.

results.heading: Results
